title: Self-Efficacy-Based E-Learning Instructional Design for Inclusive Physical Education for Students with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physical education theory and foundational understanding of teaching students with disabilities
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment for pre-service teachers to enhance integrated physical education competencies, combining online e-learning and face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Able to apply at least three self-efficacy enhancement strategies required for designing inclusive physical education for students with disabilities
Develop one integrated physical education scenario utilizing self-regulated learning principles
Produce one blended instructional design plan integrating e-learning platforms with face-to-face activities

resources: Inclusive Physical Education Case Study Video for Students with Disabilities

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
